name: obsidian-eln
description: Integrates an electronic lab notebook into Obsidian. This plugin allows you to create and manage lab notebooks, including features for organizing experiments, tracking samples, and documenting results.

scripts.dev: node build-css.mjs && node esbuild.config.mjs && node copy-assets.mjs
scripts.build: node build-css.mjs && tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production && node copy-assets.mjs
scripts.build-fast: node build-css.mjs && node esbuild.config.mjs production && node copy-assets.mjs
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
scripts.publish: npm run release && node package-assets.mjs && node package-test-vault.mjs && node publish-release.mjs
